Package kulami.gui

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ChooseBoardDialogAdapter
    Adapter interface for user input from the ChooseBoardDialog
    GameDisplayAdapter
    Adapter interface for user input from the GameDisplay
    MainframeAdapter
    Adapter interface for user input from the Mainframe
    MapEditorAdapter
    Adapter interface for user input from the MapEditor
    MessagePager
    Classes that wish to receive messages intended for the user must implement the MessagePager interface.
    NewGameDialogAdapter
    Adapter interface for user input from the NewGameDialog
    PlayerDialogAdapter
    Adapter interface for user input from the PlayerDialog
    StatusDisplayer  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChooseBoardDialog
    This dialog prompts the user for a file containing a board code and a game level (0, 1, or 2).
    GameDisplay
    This class is notified when the game state changes and displays the game using a MapPainter.
    Mainframe
    The Mainframe is the central GUI element.
    MapEditor
    The MapEditor is a frame in which a new board can be created.
    MapPainter
    The MapPainter is responsible for drawing a GameMap into a JPanel.
    MessageDisplay
    MessageDisplayhandles displaying of messages in a text panel shown to the user.
    NewGameDialog
    A dialog that prompts the user to enter a host name and a port number.
    PlayerDialog
    A dialog prompting the user for a player name, a player type, and, in case of a computer player, a difficulty level.
    StatusDisplay
    StatusDisplay displays data about the current game state in two JPanels, one for the local player and one for the opponent.
    TileComponent
    A TileComponent is a JComponent that displays one of 100 fields of a Kulami board.
